div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2163 Sicily, date unknown Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 18 AE Siculo-Punic: 3 (Persephone/horse, 1 re- struck on palm-tree/horse hd.) Ziz: 11 (Hera/bull as Gabrici, Monetazione, pl. 10, 34 [5]; male hd./Pegasus, as G., p. 195, nos. 35 ff. [6]) Disposition: Palermo Tusa Cutroni, AIIN 1956, p. 210, no. XX
